reproduction.signature: Assertion `op->use_empty() && "expected 'op' to have no uses"' failed in extractConcatToConcatExtract -> circt::comb::ExtractOp::canonicalize
reproduction.output_summary: Assertion failure in MLIR pattern rewriter during comb::ExtractOp canonicalization. Occurs when processing packed struct array with bit-level indexing.

test_case.description: SystemVerilog module with packed struct array and bit-level field indexing in always_comb and always_ff blocks

notes.fixed_in_latest: Bug appears fixed in /opt/firtool/bin/circt-verilog (firtool-1.139.0 without assertions)
